title: Documentation Manifest Schema
description: Defines the structure for tracking documentation coverage across the repository.

$schema.description: Optional JSON Schema reference for tooling.

version.description: Semantic version of the manifest definition.

updated.description: ISO-8601 timestamp for the latest manifest update.

entries.description: Categorised documentation groups with include/exclude patterns.

name.description: Human-readable label for the documentation set.

category.description: High-level grouping (e.g. root, docs, drafts, generated).

status.description: Lifecycle classification for the documentation set.

description.description: Context or usage guidance for this documentation set.

items.description: Glob pattern (POSIX style) for files to include.
Explicit repository-relative path to a documentation file.
Glob pattern for files to exclude from this set.
